trans-unit.source: Used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"></xref> of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado como um objeto de parâmetro no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"> </xref> da raiz <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollBarEventArgs class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ScrollBarEventArgs está exposta como o `e` parâmetro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollBarEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ScrollBarEventArgs contém as seguintes propriedades:-a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objeto que o evento foi gerado for.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property gets the name of the chart area; other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>propriedade obtém o nome da área de gráfico; também podem ser definidas outras propriedades da área de gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the scrollbar belongs to, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objeto que a barra de deslocamento pertence, utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>Propriedades também podem ser definidas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A> property, which is used to get the scrollbar button that the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para obter o botão de barra de deslocamento clicado o utilizador final.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A> property, which determines if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control cancels default behavior of the scrollbar button after the code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event completes execution.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A>propriedade, que determina se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controlo cancela o comportamento predefinido do botão da barra de deslocamento depois do código no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>eventos conclusão da execução.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.IsHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A> property, which represents the X position of the mouse cursor at the time the end-user clicked the scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A>propriedade, o que representa a posição X do cursor do rato no momento, o utilizador final clicado o elemento de scrollbar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionX%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A> property, which represents the Y-position of the mouse cursor at the time the end-user clicked the scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A>propriedade, o que representa a posição Y do cursor do rato no momento, o utilizador final clicado o elemento de scrollbar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.MousePositionY%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified axis, X and Y positions of the mouse cursor, and type of button clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o eixo especificado, X e Y posições do cursor do rato e tipo do botão clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> that contains the scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> que contém a barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: The X position of mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: A posição X de cursor do rato.

trans-unit.source: The Y position of mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: A posição Y de cursor do rato.

trans-unit.source: The type of button clicked.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do botão clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que pertence um deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada para:-determinam o tipo de eixo-X, X2, Y ou Y2 — que o evento está a ser gerado, utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -obter e definir as propriedades do eixo, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que representa o eixo que pertence a barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of scrollbar button that the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de botão de barra de deslocamento clicado o utilizador final.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and can be used to determine the type of scrollbar button the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>de objeto e pode ser utilizado para determinar o tipo do botão da barra de deslocamento clicado o utilizador final.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the type of scrollbar button the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType"> </xref> o utilizador final clicado no botão de valor de enumeração que representa o tipo de barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto que pertence a barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: The ChartArea property can be used to determine the chart area that the scrollbar belongs to by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ChartArea pode ser utilizada para determinar que a barra de deslocamento pertence ao aceder à área de gráfico a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade também pode ser utilizada para obter e definir as propriedades da área de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether to cancel the default behavior of specific scrollbar events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um sinalizador que indica se deve cancelar o comportamento predefinido de eventos de scrollbar específico.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está exposta no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to cancel the default behavior on specific scrollbar events.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada para cancelar o comportamento predefinido nos eventos de scrollbar específico.

trans-unit.source: If you click on a scrollbar button, the default manipulation of the view will occur.
trans-unit.target: Se clicar no botão de barra de deslocamento, a manipulação de predefinida da vista ocorrerão.

trans-unit.source: The following list summarizes this default behavior: - If the user clicks the Reset/Zoom button, the previous view will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A lista seguinte resume este comportamento predefinido:-se o utilizador clica no botão de reposição/Zoom, será apresentada na vista anterior.

trans-unit.source: - If the user clicks in the scrollbar background—that is, not on the scrolling thumb, otherwise known as the tracker— large increments and/or decrements of the scrollbar will occur, with the increment and/or decrement size being determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Se o utilizador clica em segundo plano scrollbar — ou seja, não no botão do controlo de deslocamento, caso contrário, conhecido como o controlador — incrementos grande e/ou é decrementada da barra de deslocamento ocorrerá, com o tamanho de incremento e/ou diminuir a ser determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To turn off these default behaviors, set the IsHandled property to `true` after providing custom logic in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: Para desativar estes comportamentos predefinidos, defina a propriedade de IsHandled como `true` depois de fornecer a lógica personalizada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the default behavior of the event should be cancelled, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o comportamento predefinido do evento deve ser cancelado, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X position of the mouse cursor at the time the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição X do cursor do rato no momento de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"> </xref> evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the X mouse position, in pixels, when the end-user clicks on a scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada para obter a posição do rato X, em pixels, quando o utilizador final clica num elemento de uma barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: The 0,0 coordinate represents the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada 0,0 representa o canto superior esquerdo do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the X mouse cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição do cursor de rato X.

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed in pixels, with 0,0 being the top-left corner of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: A posição é expresso em pixels, com 0,0 que está a ser o canto superior esquerdo da imagem do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Y position of the mouse cursor at the time the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição Y do cursor do rato no momento de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisScrollBarClicked"> </xref> evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the Y mouse position, in pixels, when the end-user clicks on a scrollbar element.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada para obter a posição do rato Y, em pixels, quando o utilizador final clica num elemento de uma barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: The 0,0 coordinate represents the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada 0,0 representa o canto superior esquerdo do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the Y mouse cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição do cursor de rato Y.

trans-unit.source: The position is expressed in pixels, with 0,0 being the top-left corner of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: A posição é expresso em pixels, com 0,0 que está a ser o canto superior esquerdo da imagem do gráfico.
